text: cordelia_chase I just love springtime .
cordelia_chase Me and bright spring fashions !
mitch Spring training .
cordelia_chase Me at the end of school dance .
harmony_kendall The end of school .
cordelia_chase Definitely . My favorite time of year . I am , of course , having my dress specially made . Off the rack gives me hives .
mitch Lemme guess : blue , like your eyes !
cordelia_chase My eyes are hazel , Helen Keller .
harmony_kendall You two will look so fine together in the May Queen photo .
cordelia_chase Well , I have n't been elected May Queen yet .
cordelia_chase Uhhh ! Behold , the weirdness !
buffy_summers You 're probably wondering what I 'm doing with this stuff , huh ?
cordelia_chase Wow , I 'm not !
buffy_summers Uh , for history class . Mr. Giles has this , like , hobby of collecting stuff ... which he lent me ... for show and tell . D - did I mention it 's for history class ?
harmony_kendall She is always hanging with that creepy librarian in that creepy library .
cordelia_chase Hey , did I ever tell you about the time that she attacked me ? At the Bronze ? I do n't know why this school admits mentals like her .

ms_miller ' If you prick us , do we not bleed ? If you tickle us , do we not laugh ? If you poison us , do we not die ? And if you wrong us , shall we not revenge ? ' Okay . So talk to me , people . How does what Shylock says here about being a Jew relate to our discussion about the anger of the outcast in society ?
cordelia_chase Well , how about color me totally self - involved ?
ms_miller Care to elaborate ?

cordelia_chase Yeah . With Shylock it 's whine , whine , whine , like the whole world is about him . He acts like it 's justice , him getting a pound of Antonio 's flesh . It 's not justice , it 's yicky .
ms_miller But has Shylock suffered ? What 's his place in Venice society ?
willow_rosenberg Well , everyone looked down on him .

cordelia_chase That is such a twinkie defense . Shylock should get over himself . People who think their problems are so huge craze me . Like this time I sort of ran over this girl on her bike . It was the most traumatizing event of * my * life , and she 's trying to make it about * her * leg ! Like * my * pain meant nothing .
ms_miller Well , Cordelia 's raised an interesting point here . Which we 'll pursue at a later time .
cordelia_chase Ms. Miller ?
ms_miller Good observations today , Cordelia . It 's always exciting to know someone 's actually done the reading .
cordelia_chase Thanks . Um , I wanna talk to you about my final paper . I 'm real unfocused . I have all these thoughts , and I 'm pretty sure they all contradict each other .
ms_miller Well , I have your outline here , but why do n't you stop by tomorrow after school ? We 'll go over it then .
cordelia_chase That 'd be great ! Thanks a lot .
ms_miller You 're welcome . I 'll see you then .
cordelia_chase Okay ! Bye ! Harmony !
harmony_kendall Hi !
cordelia_chase They called and said the dress is ready . It 's so great ! Mitch is gon na die !
bud_1 Hey , Mitch ! You goin' to the Bronze ?
mitch Later . I 'm pickin ' up my tux first .
bud_1 Uh huh .
mitch Got ta look sharp for the big dig .
bud_1 Oh , that 's right ! You got ta look good to be on Cordelia 's arm !
mitch Oh , it 's not her arm I 'm lookin ' to be on .
mitch Who 's there ?
mitch Okay , fun time 's over , come out .
cordelia_chase Now , remember who to vote for for May Queen ! As in me !
boy Thanks .
cordelia_chase Hi ! Is n't this the bomb ? I 'm such the campaign strategist .
harmony_kendall ' C ' . For Cordelia ?
cordelia_chase No , ' C ' for Wilma , little brain ! Of course , ' C ' for Cordelia ! This way people will associate me with something sweet !
cordelia_chase Here 's a chocolate ... Oh . I do n't think I need the loony - fringe vote .
buffy_summers Well , I - I do n't even * like * chocolates . Okay , that was the lamest comeback of our times .
xander_harris So , what 's Cordelia up to ?
buffy_summers Bribery . She 's desperate to be May Queen .
xander_harris Cordelia , man , she does love titles !
willow_rosenberg Oh , God ! Remember in sixth grade with the field trip ?
xander_harris Right ! Right ! The guy with the antlers on his belt !
willow_rosenberg Be my Deputy !
xander_harris And remember the , the hat ?
willow_rosenberg Oh God ! The hat !
buffy_summers Gee , it 's fun that we 're speaking in tongues .
willow_rosenberg I 'm sorry .
xander_harris It 's just that we had this , uh ... You had to be there .
willow_rosenberg It 's not even funny .
xander_harris Really .
willow_rosenberg Uh , Cordelia just has a history of trying too hard .
xander_harris Yeah , what kind of moron would wanna be May Queen anyway ?
buffy_summers I was .
xander_harris You what ?
buffy_summers At my old school .
xander_harris Oh ! So the , uh , * good * kind of moron would do that . The , uh , non - moron , I mean .
buffy_summers Well , we did n't call it ' May Queen ' , but we had the coronation , and the dance , and all that stuff . It was nice .
xander_harris Well , you know , you do n't need that anymore . You got us !
willow_rosenberg Be my Deputy ! Oh , God ... .
bud_1 Guys ! C'mon ! Mitch got whaled on ! I think he 's ... .
principal_snyder Dead ? Of course not . What are you , ghouls ?
principal_snyder There are no dead students here . This week . Clear back , make room , all of you .
buffy_summers Mitch , what happened ?
mitch I do n't know . I , I heard something . I tried to grab a , a bat ... that hit me .
buffy_summers What hit you ?
mitch The bat ! By itself , the thing was floating , it knocked me out .
buffy_summers I 'd better check out the scene .
principal_snyder Where do you think you 're going ?
buffy_summers Um , Mitch wanted me to get his comb . He , he likes his comb .
principal_snyder I do n't think Mitch needs his comb right now . I think Mitch needs medical attention .
principal_snyder And you need to stay away from the crime scene . Always sticking your nose in .
willow_rosenberg Sue ? What did you say ? Mitch was gon na sue the school ?
principal_snyder Sue ? Who ?
xander_harris Well , his dad is the most powerful lawyer in Sunnydale .
principal_snyder Hold on . What have you two heard ?
xander_harris His dad , the lawyer . You have n't heard of him ?
willow_rosenberg Other lawyers call him ' The Beast ' .
willow_rosenberg ' Look ' ? That 's all it said ?
xander_harris Look at what ? Look at Mitch ?
buffy_summers Maybe . All I know is it 's a message .
xander_harris And ... .
rupert_giles Ah , here you are .
buffy_summers And monsters do n't usually send messages . It 's pretty much crush , kill , destroy . This was different .
rupert_giles I 'd have to say you 're right .
buffy_summers I love it when he says that ! Any theories ?
rupert_giles Uh , I 'm , uh , it 's a bit of a puzzle , really . Um , I 've never actually heard of anyone attacked by a lone baseball bat before .
xander_harris Maybe it 's a vampire bat . I 'm alone with that one , huh ?

rupert_giles Well , assuming the bat itself is not possessed , uh , there are a few possibilities that bear investigating . Uh , someone with telekinesis , uh , the power to move objects at will , uh , uh , an invisible creature , um , or possibly a poltergeist .
willow_rosenberg A ghost ?
rupert_giles Yes , and a very angry one .
buffy_summers Yeah , I 'd say . The locker room was a real scene .
willow_rosenberg If it 's a ghost , then we 're talking about a dead kid .
buffy_summers I guess so . You know , why do n't you compile a list of dead or missing kids ? It 's probably a good place to start .
rupert_giles And , uh , I 'll research all the possibilities , ghosts included . But , uh , Xander , if you 're not doing anything , would you like to help me ?
xander_harris What , so there 's homework now ? When did that happen ?
buffy_summers It 's all part of the glamorous world of vampire slayage .
xander_harris Well , what part do you have ?
buffy_summers Gon na find out what I can about Mitch . This attack was n't random .
xander_harris Well , I want that part .
buffy_summers Fine . You can do it . Ask around , talk to his friends . Talk to Cordelia !
xander_harris Talk to Cordelia ? So , research , huh ?
harmony_kendall Hi !
cordelia_chase Oh , hi .
harmony_kendall Cordelia , you were n't in fifth period .
cordelia_chase I went to the hospital .
harmony_kendall Oh , Mitch . How is he ? Will he be okay ?

cordelia_chase Well , the doctor says he 'll be fine . They 're gon na send him home tomorrow . But ... you should 've seen him lying there . All black and blue ? How 's he gon na look in our Prom pictures ? How am I ever gon na be able to show them to anyone ?
harmony_kendall Well , they can do wonderful things with airbrushes these days .
cordelia_chase You think ?
harmony_kendall Hi !
cordelia_chase Hi ! Did you see Mitch ? He just broke up with Wendy eight seconds ago , and he 's already nosing around .
harmony_kendall It 's shameless !
cordelia_chase In the spring , if he makes varsity baseball , maybe I 'll take him on a test drive .
marcie_ross Hi , guys !
cordelia_chase What do * you * want ?
cordelia_chase I just hope they can prop him up long enough to take the picture .
buffy_summers Cordelia , can I talk to you ?
cordelia_chase Oh , great .
harmony_kendall Why is she always try ... Uff !
cordelia_chase Harmony !
principal_snyder Oh , for heaven sakes ! Clear back , everyone ! Give her some air ! You ! School nurse , now !
harmony_kendall Ow ! Oh , my ankle ! I think it 's broken .
buffy_summers What happened ?
principal_snyder Hey ! Who 's the principal here ? What happened ?
cordelia_chase She fell ! She , she , we were standing at the top of the stairs and she just fell ! All by herself !
harmony_kendall No ! I was pushed !
harmony_kendall Ow !
principal_snyder Do n't sue .
buffy_summers Is anybody here ?
buffy_summers Hey ! Who 's here ?
buffy_summers Okay , I know someone 's here . Look , I 'm not gon na hurt you . I just wanna talk to you .
buffy_summers Giles , have you ever touched a ghost ?

rupert_giles Uh , no . From what I 've heard , uh , having a , a ghost pass through you is a singular experience . It 's a , it 's a rather , uh , cold amorphous feeling . It makes your hair stand on end .
buffy_summers You see , that 's my problem . I touched the thing , but it did n't go through me . It bumped into me . And it was n't cold .
xander_harris So , we 're talking about what , an invisible person ?
buffy_summers A girl . She laughed .
rupert_giles A girl on campus with the ability to become invisible .
xander_harris That is so cool !
willow_rosenberg Cool ?
xander_harris Well , yeah , I would give anything to be able to turn invisible . Well , I would n't use my powers to beat people up , but I 'd use my powers to protect the girls ' locker room .
rupert_giles It must be a fairly heady experience ... having that ability .
willow_rosenberg How 'd she get it ? Is she a witch ? 'Cause we can fight a witch .
xander_harris Hmm . Greek myths speak of cloaks of invisibility , but they 're usually for the gods . Research Boy comes through with the knowledge !
buffy_summers This girl 's sorta petty for a god .
willow_rosenberg She 's got a grudge . But why Harmony ?
xander_harris Harmony and Mitch . The common denominator is ... .
buffy_summers Cordelia !
willow_rosenberg So what now ?
buffy_summers First thing tomorrow , why do n't you pull up that missing kids list ?
willow_rosenberg Got it . I 'll see ya then .
buffy_summers Bye .
xander_harris See ya . Oh , hey , do you wanna come to our place tonight for dinner ? Mom 's making her famous phone call to the Chinese place .
willow_rosenberg Xander , do you guys even have a stove ?
rupert_giles So , I 'll look into ways that you can de - cloak an invisible someone . What about you ?
buffy_summers I think Cordelia 's gon na be workin ' on her May Queen dress tonight . Maybe there 'll be some action . Guess I 'm gon na start the hunt .
rupert_giles How exactly do you propose to hunt someone you ca n't see ?
rupert_giles You may have to work on listening to people .
buffy_summers Very funny .
rupert_giles I thought so .
cordelia_chase Should I wear my hair up ? Do you think I should wear it up ?
cordelia_chase How does the , um , hem go ? Is it , is it long enough , or ... .
cordelia_chase Is n't it beautiful ?
rupert_giles Who 's there ?
rupert_giles A vampire casts no reflection .
angel Do n't worry . I 'm not here to eat .
rupert_giles Buffy told me you do n't feed from humans anymore .
angel Not for a long while .
rupert_giles Is that why you 're here ? To see her ?
angel I ca n't . It 's , uh ... It 's too hard for me to be around her .
rupert_giles A vampire in love with a Slayer ! It 's rather poetic ! In a maudlin sort of way . What can I , uh ... What can I do for you ?
angel I know you 've been researching the Master .
rupert_giles Yes , the vampire king . I 've tried to learn as much as I can about him for the day that Buffy must face him .
angel Something 's already in motion , something big , but I do n't know what . You 've read all the Slayer lore there is , right ?
rupert_giles I - I've studied all the extant volumes , of course . But the , uh , most salient books of Slayer prophecy have been lost . The Tiberius Manifesto , the Pergamum Codex ... .
angel The Codex ?
rupert_giles It 's reputed to have contained the most complete prophecies about the Slayer 's role in the end years . Unfortunately , the book was lost in the 15th century .
angel Not lost . Misplaced . I can get it .
rupert_giles That would be most helpful ! Uh , m - my own volumes have ... been rather useless of late .
angel Legends of Vishnu ?
rupert_giles There 's an ... invisible girl terrorizing the school .
angel That 's not really my area of expertise .
rupert_giles Nor mine , I 'm afraid . Uh , it 's fascinating , though . By all accounts it 's a , a ... a wonderful power to possess .
angel Oh , I do n't know . Looking in the mirror everyday and seeing nothing there . It 's an overrated pleasure .
cordelia_chase God ! I am never sitting through another one of those alumni lectures again . Two hours of ' My Trek Through Nepal ' . Hello ! There is nobody caring .
marcie_ross And did you guys see his toupee ? I mean , it looks like a cabbage .
cordelia_chase And those slides ! ' That 's a mountain . That 's a mountain , too . Now look at some mountains . '
harmony_kendall I swear , he had three slides and just used them over and over .
marcie_ross I know , but did you guys see his toupee ? I mean , it was , like , the worst !
harmony_kendall We 're talking , okay ?
cordelia_chase Oh ! And did you guys check out that extreme toupee ? Yeah , that 's realistic . It looked like a cabbage .
principal_snyder The winner is Cordelia Chase !
principal_snyder Let 's bring up our new May Queen .

cordelia_chase Thank you for making the right choice , and for showing me how much you all love me . Being this popular is not just my right , but my responsibility , and I want you to know I take it very seriously .
cordelia_chase It all began when ... .
xander_harris So , Giles said you 'd be here . Why are you being here ?
buffy_summers Last night was a bust . But I still think Cordy 's the key .
willow_rosenberg This is the dead and missing list . I pulled up their classes , activities , medical records ... .
buffy_summers Good work .
willow_rosenberg Has Cordelia hired a bodyguard or something ?
buffy_summers Hey , you guys , check out this one . It 's the most recent one , Marcie Ross , disappeared , like , six months ago .
xander_harris I do n't know her .
willow_rosenberg Me neither .
buffy_summers Her only activity was band . She played the flute .
willow_rosenberg So ?

buffy_summers Well , last night when I was hunting , I heard this flute , but I could n't figure out where it was coming from . And it was in the band room that I lost Miss Invisible yesterday . You know what , this all tracks . I 'm gon na check it out . See you guys later ?
xander_harris Okay , we 'll see you after geometry .
cordelia_chase Ask not what your school can do for you , ask : Hey ! What am I wearing to the Spring Fling ?
buffy_summers Marcie Ross . So it is you .
ms_miller Cordelia , could you possibly be on time ?
ms_miller Who 's there ?
cordelia_chase Ms. Miller ? Oh , my God ! Ms. Miller ! Oh , my God ! Are you okay ?
cordelia_chase Ms. Miller , what happened ?
ms_miller Attacked . Did n't see .
rupert_giles A nest ?
buffy_summers It looked like she 'd been there for months . It 's where I found this .
willow_rosenberg Oh , my God ! ' Have a nice summer . Have a nice summer . ' This girl had no friends at all .
rupert_giles Uh , once again I teeter at the precipice of the generation gap .
buffy_summers ' Have a nice summer ' is what you write when you have nothing to say .
xander_harris It 's the kiss of death .
buffy_summers You guys did n't know Marcie Ross ?
xander_harris Never met her . Why ?
buffy_summers 'Cause you both wrote it , too .
xander_harris ' Have a nice ... ' Yeesh !
willow_rosenberg Where am I ? Oh . ' Have a * great * summer . ' See , I cared !
buffy_summers You guys do n't remember her ?
xander_harris No , I probably did n't see her except to sign the book . I mean , this is a big school .
willow_rosenberg Xander , we each had four classes with her last year .
buffy_summers So , no one noticed her , and now she 's invisible .
xander_harris What , she turned invisible because no one noticed her ?
rupert_giles Of course ! I 've been investigating the mystical causes of invisibility when I , I should have looked at the quantum mechanical ! Physics .
buffy_summers I think I speak for everyone here when I say , huh ?
rupert_giles It 's a rudimentary concept that , that reality is shaped , even , even ... created by our perception .
buffy_summers And with the Hellmouth below us sending out mystical energy ... .
rupert_giles People perceived Marcie as , as , as invisible , and , and , and , and she became so .
ms_miller So , who knows the answer to this one ? Think about it .
ms_miller Cordelia ?
cordelia_chase Well , just because the story 's about him , does n't necessarily mean he 's the hero , right ?
ms_miller Exactly . So , what do we call him ? Willow ?
willow_rosenberg Well , the protagonist .
ms_miller Xander ?
xander_harris Why ca n't he be both ? I mean , he did do some things that are pretty heroic .
ms_miller Absolutely . Who does n't agree with that ?
ms_miller Okay .
ms_miller And how about you ?
buffy_summers This is n't this great power that she can control . It 's something that was done to her . That * we * did to her .
willow_rosenberg No wonder she 's miffed .
xander_harris What does she want ?
buffy_summers Just what we thought . Cordelia .
cordelia_chase What ? I knew you 'd be here . Buffy , I , uh , I , I know we 've had our differences , with you being so weird and all , and hanging out with these total losers ... .
cordelia_chase Ooo ! Well , anyway , despite all of that , I know that you share this feeling that we have for each other , deep down ... .
willow_rosenberg Nausea ?
cordelia_chase Somebody is after me ! They just tried to kill Ms. Miller ? Uh , she was helping me with my homework . And Mitch ! And Harmony ? ! This is all about me ! Me , me , me !
xander_harris Wow ! For once she 's right !
buffy_summers So you 've come to * me * for help .
cordelia_chase Because you 're always around when all this weird stuff is happening . And I know you 're very strong , and you 've got all those weapons ... I was kind of hoping you were in a gang .
cordelia_chase Please ! I do n't have anyone else to turn to !
rupert_giles Please . Sit down .
cordelia_chase Okay . Thanks .
rupert_giles You know , I ... I do n't recall ever seeing you here before .
cordelia_chase Oh , no , I have a life .
buffy_summers Okay . Cordelia , your attacker is an invisible girl .
xander_harris Who is really , really angry at you , which I ... ca n't imagine personally , but it ... takes all kinds , y'know ?
cordelia_chase Well , I do n't care what it is , just get rid of it !
buffy_summers Well , it 's not that simple , it 's a person , it 's ... . It 's this person . Now , do you have any idea why she 'd be so ... .
cordelia_chase Oh , God ! Is she really wearing Laura Ashley ?
xander_harris So homicidal ?
cordelia_chase I have no idea ! I 've never seen this girl before in my life !

marcie_ross I won 'cause you did n't see me coming . Cordelia , you do n't remember me . I remember you , all your idiot slut friends , I hate them . They take your life and they suck it out of you ! But then they did n't see me coming . They got ta learn . They got ta learn .
rupert_giles According to what you told us about the attack on Ms. Miller , we now have two messages from Marcie : ' look ' and ' listen ' .
willow_rosenberg Messages we do n't understand .

buffy_summers I do n't think we 're supposed to ... yet . Marcie 's not quite ready . But from what she did to Cordelia 's picture , I would say that she 's wigged on the whole May Queen thing . Maybe she 's gon na do something about it .
willow_rosenberg Stop the coronation tonight , maybe . Keep you guys away from the Bronze ?
cordelia_chase Nothing is keeping me from the Bronze tonight !
xander_harris Uh , can we just revel in your fabulous lack of priorities ?
cordelia_chase If I 'm not crowned tonight then , then Marcie 's won ! And that would be bad . She 's evil , okay ? Way eviler than me .
buffy_summers Cordelia has a point .
cordelia_chase Buffy 's with me on this .
buffy_summers Anyway , continuing the normal May Queen activities may be the best way to draw Marcie out . We can use Cordelia as bait .
cordelia_chase Great ! Bait ?
rupert_giles Willow , Xander , you 'll help me begin our research anew . Unless we find a way to cure Marcie 's invisibility , then Buffy will be ... .
buffy_summers A sitting duck .
buffy_summers C'mon .
cordelia_chase Well , I have to try on my dress . And am I really bait ?

cordelia_chase So , how much the creepy is it that this Marcie 's been at this for months ? Spying on us ? Learning our most guarded secrets ? So , are you saying she 's invisible because she 's so unpopular ?
buffy_summers That about sums it up .
cordelia_chase Bummer for her . It 's awful to feel that lonely .
buffy_summers Hmm . So you 've read something about the feeling ?

cordelia_chase Hey ! You think I 'm never lonely because I 'm so cute and popular ? I can be surrounded by people and be completely alone . It 's not like any of them really know me . I do n't even know if they like me half the time . People just want to be in a popular zone . Sometimes when I talk , everyone 's so busy agreeing with me , they do n't hear a word I say .
buffy_summers Well , if you feel so alone , then why do you work so hard at being popular ?
cordelia_chase Well , it beats being alone all by yourself .
willow_rosenberg Shhh ! Listen !
rupert_giles Come on .
rupert_giles We could ... talk to her . Perhaps reason with her . Or possibly grab her .
willow_rosenberg There are three of us .
xander_harris Let 's go !
cordelia_chase If you ever tell to anyone that I changed in a mop closet ... .
buffy_summers Your secret dies with me . Looks okay . But hurry .
cordelia_chase Okay .
xander_harris Over here .
rupert_giles Marcie ? We know what happened to you . Please , can we talk to you ?
willow_rosenberg We 're sorry we ignored you .
xander_harris Can you say ' gulp ' ?
rupert_giles What 's that sound ?
buffy_summers You know what you were saying before ? I understand . Somehow it does n't seem to matter how popular you are when ... .
cordelia_chase You were popular ? In what alternate universe ?
buffy_summers In L.A. Th - the point is , I did sort of feel like something was missing .
cordelia_chase Is that when you became weird and got kicked out ?
buffy_summers Okay . Can we have the heartfelt talk with a little less talk from you ? Cordelia ?
buffy_summers Cordelia !
buffy_summers Cordelia !
cordelia_chase Buffy !
rupert_giles It 's gas . She 's snuffed out the pilot light ! The gas is on full ! I ca n't find the shutoff valve .
xander_harris Is this it ?
willow_rosenberg Okay , that 's bad . How 'bout the door ?
rupert_giles NO ! One spark and you 'll take the whole building with us !
buffy_summers Cordelia ! Cordelia ! Oh , my God !
cordelia_chase Buffy ? You 're awake ?
buffy_summers Yeah .
cordelia_chase I ca n't feel my face !
buffy_summers What do you mean ?
cordelia_chase My face . My face is numb . What is she doing ?
buffy_summers I do n't know .
cordelia_chase What does that mean ?
buffy_summers I do n't know .
rupert_giles That should give us a few minutes , but we b ... . If we do n't get out of this room soon ... .
willow_rosenberg Why is Marcie doing this ?
rupert_giles The loneliness , the constant exile , she 's ... she has gone mad !
xander_harris Ya think ?
marcie_ross Uh , I 'm disappointed . I 'd really hoped you guys had figured it out by now .
buffy_summers Well , why do n't you explain it ? C'mon , Marcie , what are we supposed to learn ?
cordelia_chase Yeah , what do you wanna teach us !
marcie_ross You do n't get it . You 're not the student . You 're the lesson .
cordelia_chase What did you do to my face ?

marcie_ross Your face . That 's what this is all about , is n't it ? Your beautiful face . That 's what makes you shine just a little bit brighter than the rest of us . We all want what you have . To be noticed , remembered . To be seen .
cordelia_chase What are you doing ?
marcie_ross Well , I 'm fulfilling your fondest wish .
marcie_ross I 'm gon na give you a face no one will ever forget .
rupert_giles One , two , three !
rupert_giles Again !
buffy_summers Marcie , you ca n't do this .
marcie_ross What are you gon na do ? Slay me ?
buffy_summers Marcie , you know this is wrong .
marcie_ross You shoulda stayed outta my way . Y'know , I , I thought , I thought you would understand my vision , but you 're just like them .
cordelia_chase Please do n't do this ! Nooohohoho !
marcie_ross You should be grateful . I mean , people who pass you in the street are gon na remember you for the rest of their lives .
marcie_ross Children are gon na dream about you . And every one of your , your friends who comes to the coronation tonight will take the sight of the May Queen to their graves .
cordelia_chase Wait !
marcie_ross No , we really have to get started . The local anesthetic 's gon na wear off soon , and I do n't want you to faint . It 's less fun if you 're not awake .
xander_harris You guys are ... I 'm blacking out on you .
marcie_ross Let me see . I think we should start with your smile . I think it should be wider .
